title: brand new computer, wont launch past the icon....
body: ive gone through everything i can find, deleting stuff in the RADS folder and everything! i dont know what else to do! ive dont everything! it just never gets pastt like 10% of that opening bar please help!!!

replies.body:
When you experience issues when trying to Launch League, it's often caused by League not being assigned proper system permissions. This is because League interacts with a ton of files and a few software packages outside of the League folder. Without permission to access these items, League can fail to start. The guide that *Rineyy* goes over the most common fixes for this. 

Let me know if you still have issues after working through that guide.

[Grant League permission to run on your computer!](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)

http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Annie_3.jpg
